thread.title: Ben Bonanno
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Ben Bonanno

author: Ben Bonanno
title: Ben Bonanno
text:
I just bought a new pair of sunglasses from Otticanet. I price compared in the stores at $190 retail. I then got online and bought them from Otticanet at $124.20 with free shipping via FedEx. They arrived quickly, at he exact time I was given and I saved $65. This is my second purchase from Otticanet with a total saving on 2 pairs of glasses at almost $215.
Take it from me DO NOT BUY RETAIL!!!!
Cheers Otticanet.
